name: STANDARD 4-Post Lift
description: The world champion value in automotive lifts.  Offering the ability to lift up to 8 thousand pounds and allow up to 6.25 feet of drive under space there is not a better value in lifts on the market.  Our 4 POST LIFTS can be securely anchored into your space's floor or can be easily moved by one person with our ingenious caster dolly system.

name: CLEAR FLOOR 2-Post Lift
description: Offers even more flexibility than other 2 Post lifts by allowing for the use of both asymmetric and symmetric arm configurations, allowing for a clear working floor under the vehicle allowing for the use of roll jacks, oil drains, etc...  An increased degree of stability is provided by tying the twin columns together.

name: FLOOR PLATE 2-Post Lift
description: Offers confidence inspiring body/frame lifting utility within the smallest amount of space at the best possible price.  With aircraft grade equalization cables and hydraulic hoses protected by beveled diamond steel floor plate, your ability to lift up to 9921lbs, 5.7 feet in the air will be confidence inspiring and unmatched in value.

name: Single Post Lift
description: Offers the ultimate in flexibility when it comes to vehicle lifting.  By allowing the user to take the lift to the vehicle, accessibility becomes anything but an issue.  This space saving powerhouse allows for up to 5512 pounds of lifting capacity up to 5.9 feet off the ground.
